We Need Call centre to sell VOIP SERVICES

 

1.You will be paid $800 per staff or seat dialing for COMPANY.

2. Each agent would endeavor to make at least 14 sales per day of  $26 US/CANADA unlimited residential calling plans.
3. In case your 1 agent/staff can make sales above $ 8,000 in 22 sales per month we will pay you an additional you as follows ;-

    for $8500 ~ 9500   = Payout would be $900 per seat

    for $9501 ~ 11000 = payout would be $1000 per seat

    for $11001 and above would be $1100 per seat
